page.title: 07A day in Richard's life
page.content: I am 15 years old. A typical school day for me would be to get up at 7.00. I get ready for school at 8.15, then I walk to school with my friends. I enter the school gates at 8.45, then we wait at the front of the school ready to go into assembly. We go to registration, then at 9.25 we go to our first lesson. There are 4 lessons in the morning. There is a 15 minute break in the middle of the morning. Lunch time is at 12.05. I go home and have sandwiches. At 1.10 we have registration then back to lessons. The bell rings at 3.45 for end of school so we then go home. When I get home I get changed out of my school uniform which is black and white, and go out with my friends. Sometimes I play cards. I do my homework in school.I am looking forward to leaving school next year.
